title: Processes - Area between Curves - Functions of y

content.question: Let <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the region between the graph of <math alttext="y equals, the natural log of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-axis, and the line <math alttext="x equals 5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following gives the area of region <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the integral from, 0 to 5, of, open parenthesis, 5 minus, e to the y power, close parenthesis, d y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the integral from, 1 to 5, of, open parenthesis, 5 minus, e to the y power, close parenthesis, d y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the integral from, 0 to the natural log of 5, of, open parenthesis, 5 minus, e to the y power, close parenthesis, d y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the integral from, 1 to the natural log of 5, of, open parenthesis, 5 minus, e to the y power, close parenthesis, d y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the integral from, 0 to the natural log of 5, of, open parenthesis, 5 minus, e to the y power, close parenthesis, d y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

topic.text: 8.5: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of y

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
